breathing444.title: 4-4-4 Breathing (Box Breathing)
breathing444.excerpt: Calm the Nervous System in 2-5 Minutes
breathing444.tldrContent: Inhale through nose for 4 counts, hold for 4, exhale for 4. 3-6 rounds. Keep jaw and shoulders soft.
breathing444.whyItWorksContent: Consciously slowing the breath rhythm increases heart rate variability; this strengthens the "no danger" signal. Especially safe and practical for quickly softening small tension waves during the day.
breathing444.step1Content: Feet on the ground, spine long; without fighting your body.
breathing444.step3Content: For 4 counts; without straining, as if waiting.
breathing444.step4Content: For 4 counts, as if flickering a candle without blowing it out.
breathing444.step5Content: Continue for 3-6 rounds; extend to 2-3 minutes if it feels good.
breathing444.mistake1Content: Can cause dizziness. If difficult, try 4-4-6 or 4-2-6.
breathing444.mistake2Content: Lower the breath to belly; shoulders shouldn't rise.
breathing444.mistake3Content: Emotional wave subsides gently, give it time.
breathing444.noteContent: Extending the exhale by 1-2 counts (4-4-6) activates the parasympathetic system faster. If you wish, accompany the exhale with "purple spark in the heart" imagery.

bodyScan.title: Body Scan
bodyScan.tldrContent: Move attention from feet to head; don't try to change—just notice and accompany with breath.
bodyScan.whyItWorksContent: Mind "tells", body "understands". Scanning makes body sensations visible; noticed tension is already the first step of relaxation. Regular practice teaches catching micro-tensions faster during the day.
bodyScan.step1Content: Adjust posture, let breath be natural.
bodyScan.step2Content: Feet → calves → knees → hips → belly → chest → shoulders → neck → face.
bodyScan.mistake1Content: Forcing creates reverse effect. "2% softening intention" is enough.
bodyScan.mistake2Content: Stay at least 2-3 breaths to "catch" the sensation.
bodyScan.noteContent: Imagine "purple spark" softening the edges of that region with each exhale. Apply with eyes open if needed.

hooponopono.title: Ho'oponopono
hooponopono.tldrContent: "I'm sorry. Please forgive me. Thank you. I love you."—around the heart, with breath.
hooponopono.shortFrameContent: Ho'oponopono is a repair practice done with the intention of bringing relationships and inner world into "harmony". In modern individual versions, four sentences are spoken inward.
hooponopono.sentence1Content: I acknowledge the pain I unknowingly created.
hooponopono.sentence2Content: I embrace the fragile part within me with compassion.
hooponopono.sentence3Content: I appreciate the lesson this experience taught me.
hooponopono.sentence4Content: I connect with love and invite healing.
hooponopono.step2Content: Match each sentence with a breath:
hooponopono.step2Point2: Listen to its echo while exhaling
hooponopono.mistake1Content: Intention is enough; process may take time.
hooponopono.mistake2Title: Expectation of "Should Finish in One Round"
hooponopono.mistake2Content: Repair is a state of repeated relationship.
hooponopono.noteContent: You can direct the sentences to a person, an event, or just to the fragile part within you. Reference the "purple spark" in the heart area.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Protecting your personal data is important to us.
privacyPolicy.introduction: This Privacy Policy explains how your personal data is collected, used, stored, and protected when you use our website and online services operated by Purple Spark ("We"). We comply with the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 (KVKK) and related legislation. GDPR principles are also observed for users accessing from EU/EEA.
summaryItems: The site cannot function without mandatory cookies; analytical/marketing cookies require consent.
We collect basic data for reservations and communication, using it only to provide the service.
You can cancel marketing messages at any time.
Write to info@morkivilcim.com for your rights under KVKK.
privacyPolicy.contactText: You can contact us for questions about our privacy policy:

policyScopeContent.notCovered: Links to our social media accounts are not subject to this policy; the relevant platforms' own policies apply.

dataCategoriesContent.contentDesc: Newsletter/messaging preferences, workshop selection, appointment time.

items: Legitimate interest (security, fraud prevention, basic analytics).
